short_summary: The contract is for collection of input price data for farm market analysis
description: The contract will last until March 31 2026
full_summary:
Government Tender Announcement
===========

### Title

Ontario and Great Lakes Farm Input Price Survey

### Reference Number

PW-22-01018415

### Solicitation Number

01B68-22-0063

### Publication Date

December 22, 2022

### Tender Closing Date

February 1, 2023, 12:00:00 UTC

### Tender Description

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada is seeking data on current farm input prices to support ongoing analysis of how changing farm input prices impact farm operating expenses and the farm income situation. The data will be used to monitor input price levels, compare them with neighboring U.S. states, and analyze farm input markets and prices.

### Contract Details

* **Duration**: The contract will begin on the contract award date and end on March 31, 2026.
* **G-SIN Code**: B301A (Data Analysis - Performance of a Survey)
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Tender Status

The tender is closed, and the tender status is expired.

### Contact Information

* Name: Rhonda DiMarco
* Email: rhonda.dimarco@agr.gc.ca

### Attachments

The tender package is available for download at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/23/f99012ac56048a111e799eb156aa6853/22-0063_ont._price_survey_rfp.1_-_e.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/23/f99012ac56048a111e799eb156aa6853/22-0063_ont._price_survey_rfp.1_-_e.pdf) (English) and [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/23/446459da2535b2c7350a4f27646d921d/22-0063_ont._price_survey_rfp.1_-_f.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/23/446459da2535b2c7350a4f27646d921d/22-0063_ont._price_survey_rfp.1_-_f.pdf) (French).');I can make minor changes if any. 

It appears your changes are very significant.
